instruction: If you could help me write an email to my friends inviting them to dinner on Friday, it would be greatly appreciated.
output:
Subject: Dinner Invitation - Let's Catch Up on Friday!

Hey friends,

I hope this email finds you well. I was thinking about how long it's been since we all got together, and I wanted to invite you all to my place for dinner this Friday. It's been a while since we've had a chance to catch up and share some good food and drinks.

I'll be preparing some of my favorite dishes, including lasagna, garlic bread, and a delicious salad. I'll also have some wine and beer available for those who want to enjoy a drink or two.

Please let me know if you can make it by replying to this email. I'd love to have everyone there, but I understand if some of you have other plans. If you can't make it, please let me know so I can save you a spot for the next time we get together.

Looking forward to seeing you all on Friday!

Best,
[Your Name]
